Pólko  (is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Pasłęk, within Elbląg County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north-west of Pasłęk,  east of Elbląg, and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
